name: com.crumbling-games.mufflonutil
description:
Various utility components and functions like. 
For example singletons and object pools, extensions for Timeline, Mecanim and more.

samples.description: Core example files, demonstrating basic components of the utility.
A state machine where each state is represented with an scriptable-object asset.
A state machine using Unity's Mecanim Animator and state behaviours.
A variety of extensions for Unity's Timeline. Custom tracks & asset-less markers that carry data.
